Name: Battleground Shooting Training 吃鸡枪法训练器
About the game: Battleground Shooting Training is a realistic shooting game, that you can experience the real-life firearm feel. Every firearm has been well-modified to perfectly reappear the shooting feedback, making your battle journey more smoothly, every shot can take down an enemy. The game features A variety of real guns, each with a different feel. Vector Uzi UMP9 m16a4 scar-l m416 akm groza kar98k m24 sks awm Lifelike physics engine, experience real shooting pleasure.
